titleStmt.title: Lamentatio civitatis, or, Londons complaint against her children in the countrey shewing her weaknesse, poverty, and desolatenesse ... : as also a brief account how many died in the years 1529 [i.e. 1592], 1603, 1625, 1630, 1636,1637, 1638, 1646,1647 1648, with this present year 1665 : likewise several preservatives against the infection.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Rogers ... and are to be sold at his house, or at Tho. Glasbrook ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his house, or at Tho. Glasbrook
